abstract: sigmaroc earns buy rating from berenberg bank .
article: berenberg bank reiterated their buy rating on shares of sigmaroc in a research note released on thursday . berenberg bank currently has a gbx 105 price objective on the stock . sigmaroc opened at gbx 42.25 on thursday . the firm has a market capitalization of $ 59.93 and a p/e ratio of -27.26 . sigmaroc has a 1-year low of gbx 36.75 and a 1-year high of gbx 49.60 . in other news , insider garth palmer purchased 10,000 shares of the business 's stock in a transaction on wednesday , december 13th . the stock was acquired at an average price of gbx 44 per share , for a total transaction of Â£ 4,400 .

it is engaged in developing its pipeline of transactions and projects .
